keyMoments.title: Arrives at Marineford
keyMoments.description: Luffy and the Impel Down escapees crash into the battlefield at Marineford on a stolen Marine battleship.
keyMoments.significance: Luffy's arrival at Marineford marks a turning point in the war and brings hope to the rescue mission for Ace.

keyMoments.title: Uses Gear Second Water Kick Against Crocodile
keyMoments.description: Luffy stops Crocodile's attack on Whitebeard by using Gear Second with a water-coated kick, exploiting Crocodile's weakness.
keyMoments.significance: Demonstrates Luffy's strategic thinking and memory of his previous battles, as well as his determination to protect Whitebeard for Ace's sake.
keyMoments.quote: If the giant old man was indeed Whitebeard, no one was touching him as the Emperor was the only person Ace truly cared about.

keyMoments.title: Meets Whitebeard for the First Time
keyMoments.description: Luffy meets Edward Newgate face-to-face for the first time. Whitebeard recognizes his straw hat as the one that belonged to Shanks.
keyMoments.significance: A monumental meeting between the future Pirate King and one of the strongest pirates of the current era, connecting Luffy to Shanks' legacy.

keyMoments.title: Declares He Will Become Pirate King to Whitebeard
keyMoments.description: Luffy boldly declares his intention to surpass Whitebeard and become the Pirate King in front of the entire battlefield.
keyMoments.significance: One of the most audacious moments in the series, showing Luffy's fearlessness and unwavering conviction that stuns everyone present.
keyMoments.quote: Don't tell me what to do! I'm going to become the Pirate King!

bounties.reason: Defeating Warlord Gecko Moria and attacking World Nobles

relationships.notes: Luffy is attempting to rescue Ace from execution at Marineford
Luffy and Whitebeard tacitly agree to work together to save Ace, despite Luffy declaring he will surpass Whitebeard

reveals.information: Uses water to exploit Crocodile's Devil Fruit weakness

name.japanese: エドワード・ニューゲート

keyMoments.title: Meets Luffy for the First Time
keyMoments.description: Whitebeard meets Luffy face-to-face and recognizes his straw hat as the one that once belonged to Shanks.
keyMoments.significance: Whitebeard acknowledges Luffy as carrying Shanks' will and representing the New Age.

keyMoments.title: Recalls Shanks' Words About the New Age
keyMoments.description: Whitebeard remembers Shanks telling him about betting his arm on the New Age when he sees Luffy's straw hat.
keyMoments.significance: Connects important moments in One Piece history and shows Shanks' faith in Luffy from the beginning.

relationships.notes: Whitebeard remembers Shanks' words about the New Age when seeing Luffy's straw hat
Acknowledges Luffy's determination and allows him to pursue his own path

keyMoments.title: Resigns from the Shichibukai
keyMoments.description: Jinbe formally announces to Sengoku that he is resigning his position as one of the Seven Warlords of the Sea.
keyMoments.significance: A significant political move that weakens the World Government and shows Jinbe's loyalty to his principles over his official position.
keyMoments.quote: Sengoku! I resign from my position as a Warlord of the Sea!
